radiographic_examinations.findings: T2 hyperintensity surrounding the head of the pancreas consistent with edema; surrounding fat stranding; compressed pancreatic duct within the head of the pancreas; multiple subcentimeter pancreatic cystic lesions in the body of the pancreas; mildly enlarged lymph node superior to the pancreatic neck; multiple T2 hyperintense cystic lesions within the liver; lesion in the right adrenal gland consistent with right adrenal adenoma; subcentimeter simple cyst within the upper pole of the right kidney.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesion in the right adrenal gland is unchanged since the previous CT.
